title: John Oliver Interviews Stephen | Colbert Classic
description:
Ever wondered what kind of questions to ask on a first date? Wonder no more as guest host John Oliver takes over the desk to ask Stephen Colbert some date night questions over drinks in this classic flipped interview from 2019.
